displaySettingsDescription: Your display settings let you customize your viewing experience based on your preferences.
primaryBody: Preferred language for Gaia. The site will be in this language.
secondaryBody: You can watch additional content produced in multiple languages.  Not all videos are available in every language.
toggleThis: Opt in to receive Gaia emails.
emailSubtext: Stay up-to-date with your favorite Gaia topics. Choose your email preferences below.
emarsysUnavailable: We're sorry, our email subscription service is currently unavailable.
